short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Each new tab is a scratchpad for your mind.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
PANED is a new tab override extension designed to serve as a scratchpad for quick and easy note-taking directly in your browser.

As the name would suggest, you can create multiple panes to separate your scratch pads, bringing some degree of order to what's otherwise intended to be a very unstructured place.

PANED is not designed for long-form content creation -- it's intended to be a quick, messy, and productive.

There are no rules.
